data.name: KeepUp Survival -  Zombie Expansion
data.detailed_description:
This DLC pack contains:.

A Free Zombie Expansion!

This expansion allows you to play against zombies. It reduces the number of animals to make survival more difficult, and the threat of zombies is increased.

You can return to the original game at any time without losing the SaveGame!

This product requires the Steam version of the main game KeepUp Survival to play.

data.short_description: A Free Zombie Expansion! This expansion allows you to play against zombies. It reduces the number of animals to make survival more difficult, and the threat of zombies is increased.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Polish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, French, Portuguese, Swedish, Turkish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i5 or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 940 4GB or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB / NVIDIA GTX 1080 8GB

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Blood is displayed when an animal or character is killed.
